text:
[Verse]
Golden skies turn to fire
City lights start to shine
Whispers of the night
Magic in the air tonight

[Verse 2]
Stars begin to glow
Moon is taking flight
Walking down these streets
Colors of the evening light

[Chorus]
Sunset colors fade away
Hold on to the end of day
Dreams are painting in the sky
Catch a glimpse as they fly by

[Verse 3]
Neon signs flashing bright
Music in the distant air
Dancing shadows play
Celebrate without a care

[Chorus]
Sunset colors fade away
Hold on to the end of day
Dreams are painting in the sky
Catch a glimpse as they fly by

[Bridge]
Every moment feels so right
Hearts are beating in the night
Never let this magic go
Let our spirits flow
title: Sunset Colors
